workflow.name: AI-powered outreach & follow-up automation (GPT-4o + Gmail + Google Sheets)
workflow.description:
## Description
 Automate your AI-powered outreach and follow-up pipeline end-to-end with GPT-4o, Gmail, and Google Sheets. ü§ñüì¨
 This workflow personalizes emails for each lead, manages follow-ups automatically, tracks client replies, and updates CRM records in real time ‚Äî all from a single Google Sheet. Ideal for sales and growth teams looking to convert leads faster without manual effort. ‚öôÔ∏èüöÄ

## What This Template Does
 1Ô∏è‚É£ Starts manually when you click ‚ÄúExecute workflow.‚Äù üïπÔ∏è
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Fetches all leads from the Google Sheet (sample_leads_50). üìä
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Validates email format and filters only active (unbooked) leads. üîç
 4Ô∏è‚É£ Uses Azure OpenAI GPT-4o to generate short, personalized outreach emails in HTML. ‚úâÔ∏è
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Cleans and parses the AI output (subject + HTML body). üß†
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Sends the first outreach email via Gmail and stores its thread ID. üì§
 7Ô∏è‚É£ Waits 24 hours, then checks for a client reply in the Gmail thread. ‚è±Ô∏è
 8Ô∏è‚É£ If a positive reply is found ‚Üí marks lead as BOOKED and updates in Sheets. ‚úÖ
 9Ô∏è‚É£ If no reply ‚Üí triggers a polite follow-up email, waits again 24 hours, and checks the thread a second time. üîÅ
 üîü If a second reply is found ‚Üí marks BOOKED and logs the client message.
 
1Ô∏è‚É£1Ô∏è‚É£ If still no response ‚Üí updates status to Declined in Google Sheets. ‚ùå
 
1Ô∏è‚É£2Ô∏è‚É£ Logs invalid or incomplete leads to a separate sheet for data cleanup. üßæ

## Key Benefits
 ‚úÖ Eliminates manual outreach and follow-up effort.
 ‚úÖ Produces personalized, context-aware AI emails for every lead.
 ‚úÖ Auto-tracks replies and updates CRM status with zero input.
 ‚úÖ Prevents duplicate or repeated contact with booked clients.
 ‚úÖ Keeps lead database synchronized and audit-ready.

## Features
- Google Sheets integration for dynamic lead retrieval and updates.
- Regex-based email validation for clean data pipelines.
- Azure OpenAI GPT-4o for contextual email writing.
- Two-stage Gmail automation (initial + follow-up).
- JavaScript parsing for AI output and Gmail thread analysis.
- Automated 24-hour wait and recheck logic.
- Conditional branches for Booked / Declined / Invalid outcomes.
- End-to-end CRM synchronization without manual review.

## Requirements
- Google Sheets OAuth2 credentials with read/write access.
- Azure OpenAI API key for GPT-4o model access.
- Gmail OAuth2 credentials with send, read, modify permissions.

## Environment Variables
- GOOGLE_SHEET_LEADS_ID
- GOOGLE_SHEET_OUTREACH_TAB_ID
- AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY
- GMAIL_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID
- GMAIL_OAUTH_SECRET

## Target Audience
 üíº Sales and Business Development teams automating outreach.
 üìà Marketing and Growth teams running re-engagement campaigns.
 ü§ñ Automation and RevOps teams integrating AI lead workflows.
 üí¨ Freelancers and agencies managing large prospect lists.
 üìä Operations teams maintaining CRM cleanliness and tracking.

## Step-by-Step Setup Instructions
 1Ô∏è‚É£ Connect your Google Sheets, Azure OpenAI, and Gmail credentials.
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Set your Google Sheet ID and tab name (outreach automation).
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Update the GPT-4o system prompt to match your tone and signature.
 4Ô∏è‚É£ Verify column headers (Company Name, Email, Booking Status, etc.).
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Test the email validation branch with sample data.
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Run once manually to confirm Gmail thread creation and reply detection.
 7Ô∏è‚É£ Confirm successful CRM updates in Google Sheets.
 8Ô∏è‚É£ Activate for continuous lead outreach and follow-up automation. ‚úÖ

workflow.name: AI-Powered Outreach & Follow-Up Automation (GPT-4o + Gmail + Google Sheets)

nodes.name: Retrieve Lead Records from Google Sheets

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI sales assistant that writes short, friendly, and professional B2B outreach emails in HTML format. Each email should be under 150 words and formatted using

, , and
tags. Always output both the Subject and the Email Body separately. Do not include or tags. The tone should be polite, conversational, and slightly persuasive. End with a clear call to action (like booking a meeting) and sign off as ‚ÄúSaurabh Garg, Sales Team.‚Äù Return your answer in JSON format with two keys: { "subject": "...", "body_html": "..." }

nodes.name: Send Initial Outreach Email via Gmail
Fetch Sent Email Thread from Gmail
Wait Before Second Thread Check (24 hr)
Send Second Follow-Up Email via Gmail

parameters.message:
=

Hi {{ $json["Contact Person"] || "there" }},

I wanted to quickly follow up on my previous email. I understand things can get busy, so just checking if you had a chance to review my message.

I‚Äôd love to schedule a short chat to explore how we could support {{ $('Retrieve Lead Records from Google Sheets').item.json['Contact Person'] }} in your upcoming initiatives.

If now‚Äôs not a good time, no worries ‚Äî just let me know when it might be better for you.

Best regards,
Saurabh Garg
Sales Team
parameters.subject: Still open to a quick chat.

nodes.name: Update Lead Status to Declined (Set Node)
Log Invalid Leads to Google Sheets

parameters.content:
## ü§ñ AI-Powered Outreach & Follow-Up Automation (GPT-4o + Gmail + Google Sheets)
Automates personalized outreach, follow-ups, and lead status management directly from Google Sheets using GPT-4o and Gmail.

### üîπ Core Workflow Summary
1Ô∏è‚É£ Fetches leads from Google Sheets  
2Ô∏è‚É£ Validates lead data and filters ‚ÄúBOOKED‚Äù prospects  
3Ô∏è‚É£ Generates personalized outreach emails using GPT-4o  
4Ô∏è‚É£ Sends emails via Gmail and monitors for replies  
5Ô∏è‚É£ If no reply ‚Üí Sends automated follow-up  
6Ô∏è‚É£ Updates lead booking status automatically in Google Sheets

### üîπ Tools & Integrations
- Google Sheets ‚Üí Lead database  
- Azure OpenAI (GPT-4o) ‚Üí Email personalization  
- Gmail ‚Üí Message delivery + reply tracking  
- JavaScript ‚Üí Data cleanup and formatting  
- Wait nodes ‚Üí Timing for recheck and follow-ups  

### üîπ Use Case
Ideal for sales teams handling cold/warm leads who need to automate email outreach, monitor engagement, and maintain clean CRM updates ‚Äî all without manual effort.

## üßæ Retrieve Lead Records from Google Sheets  
Pulls all lead data from the specified Google Sheet (‚Äúsample_leads_50‚Äù).  
Includes fields like company name, contact person, job title, industry, and booking status.  
Acts as the entry point for the outreach campaign.

## üß© Validate Lead Data Payload  
Ensures that each record has a valid email address format using regex.  
If valid ‚Üí proceeds to filtering.  
If invalid ‚Üí logs details to the ‚ÄúInvalid Leads‚Äù sheet.

## üéØ Filter for Booked Leads  
Separates leads based on the ‚ÄúBooking Status‚Äù column.  
Only unbooked or open leads proceed to email generation.  
Prevents re-contacting leads already converted or declined.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Configure GPT-4o Model  
Links Azure OpenAI GPT-4o model for personalized email generation.  
Ensures each message is contextually relevant, professional, and concise.

## ‚úâÔ∏è Generate Personalized Outreach Email (AI) GPT-4o creates customized outreach messages for each lead using name, industry, and lead source context. Output includes: - ‚Äúsubject‚Äù ‚Üí catchy and relevant - ‚Äúbody_html‚Äù ‚Üí mobile-friendly HTML with

and tags Ends with a polite CTA signed as ‚ÄúSaurabh Garg, Sales Team.‚Äù

## üß† Parse AI Email Output (JavaScript)  
Cleans GPT-4o output by removing code blocks and parsing JSON safely.  
Ensures valid `subject` and `body_html` fields before email dispatch.

## üì§ Send Initial Outreach Email via Gmail  
Delivers the AI-generated email to the lead‚Äôs email address.  
Uses Gmail OAuth for secure delivery.  
Stores Gmail thread IDs for tracking replies.

## ‚è±Ô∏è Wait Before Thread Check  
Introduces a controlled delay (e.g., 24 hours) before checking if the lead has replied.  
Ensures enough time for recipients to respond naturally.

## üß© Check for Client Reply  
Fetches Gmail thread data to see if a response was received.  
If the message contains any positive snippet or ‚ÄúYes‚Äù, marks lead as ‚ÄúBOOKED.‚Äù  
If not, moves to follow-up sequence.

## üì¨ Extract Reply Details (JavaScript)  
Parses client reply text and extracts useful data (email, message, thread ID).  
Sanitizes Gmail snippets by removing quoted text.  
Stores results for CRM update.

## ‚úÖ Update Lead Record ‚Äì Booked (Google Sheets)  
Updates the lead record in the main sheet with ‚ÄúBOOKED‚Äù status, reply message, and timestamp.  
Maintains real-time CRM hygiene.

## üîÅ Send Second Follow-Up Email via Gmail  
If no reply after the first email, sends a polite follow-up after 24 hours.  
Tone remains professional and friendly, encouraging response without pressure.

## ‚è±Ô∏è Wait Before Thread Check  
Introduces a controlled delay (e.g., 24 hours) before checking if the lead has replied.  
Ensures enough time for recipients to respond naturally.

## üì® Fetch Follow-Up Thread from Gmail  
Retrieves the Gmail thread of the follow-up message to check if a new reply arrived.

## üîç Check for Second Reply  
Inspects the follow-up thread for responses.  
Branches into ‚ÄúReply Found‚Äù (update as BOOKED) or ‚ÄúNo Reply‚Äù (mark as Declined).

## ‚ùå Update Lead Record ‚Äì Declined (Google Sheets)  
If no response after follow-up, updates status to ‚ÄúDeclined.‚Äù  
Prevents repeated outreach and keeps CRM clean.

## üßæ Extract Second Reply Details (JavaScript)  
Handles cases where the client replied to the follow-up instead of the first message.  
Parses, cleans, and prepares structured JSON data for CRM update.

## ‚úÖ Update Lead Record ‚Äì Booked (Google Sheets)  
Updates the lead record in the main sheet with ‚ÄúBOOKED‚Äù status, reply message, and timestamp.  
Maintains real-time CRM hygiene.

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Log Invalid Leads to Google Sheets  
Stores invalid or incomplete entries (missing emails, broken data) in a separate sheet.  
Useful for data quality improvement.

main.node: Log Invalid Leads to Google Sheets
Fetch Sent Email Thread from Gmail
Send Initial Outreach Email via Gmail
Retrieve Lead Records from Google Sheets
Send Second Follow-Up Email via Gmail
Update Lead Status to Declined (Set Node)
Wait Before Second Thread Check (24 hr)

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
